item.title: Learning Elm with 2048 game
item.description: Last summer, I was curious to try out Elm for its marketed term: “optimized for developer happiness”, so I thought of building 2048 game with it. 2048 Game 2048 is a game created by gabrielecirulli which went viral in 2014. I chose 2048 because the functioning of the game is simple which will help me/us understand Elm clearly. You can play here. Whats the game? The functioning of the game is:
